newsitem.title: USA: Reuters day-to-day calendar totals $769 mln.
newsitem.headline: Reuters day-to-day calendar totals $769 mln.

text.p: Reuters day-to-day municipal bond sales calendar totals $769 million in eight offerings for the week of August 26, slightly up from the $721 million total this week, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
The largest issue on the calendar is a $510 million Illinois Metropolitan Pier and Exposition Authority revenue bond offering through Smith Barney Inc.
